an5.30:1.4: Not sure why BB switches to “brahmin householders” here. Previously in AN he’s translated brāhmaṇagahapatika as “brahmins and householders”, as the contexts imply.
an5.30:2.3: Thanks to the wonders of Youtube, we can hear just what that sounds like: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gFkmIxceFtQ
